alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Converse County Lower Elevations; South Laramie Range; Southwest Carbon County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 13 at 11:59AM MST until December 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest Wind of 30 to 40 mph with gusts around 60 mph possible. Wind speeds in the mountains of 40 to 50 mph with gusts around 70 mph possible. * WHERE...Converse County Lower Elevations, Southwest Platte County, Southwest Carbon County, and the Central and South Laramie Range. * WHEN...From late tonight through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Converse County Lower Elevations; South Laramie Range; Southwest Carbon County
